TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit AngleExtensions extends System.Object

MemberSignature.Value: public static UnitsNet.Angle Difference (UnitsNet.Angle currentTrack, UnitsNet.Angle destinationTrack);
.method public static hidebysig valuetype UnitsNet.Angle Difference(valuetype UnitsNet.Angle currentTrack, valuetype UnitsNet.Angle destinationTrack) cil managed
Public Function Difference (currentTrack As Angle, destinationTrack As Angle) As Angle
static member Difference : UnitsNet.Angle * UnitsNet.Angle -> UnitsNet.Angle

Docs.summary: Calculate the difference between two angles. Useful to compute the angle error between a desired and an actual track.
Docs.returns: The normalized result of -. The value is negative if the current track is to port (left) of the the desired track and positive otherwise

static member MagneticToTrue : UnitsNet.Angle * UnitsNet.Angle -> UnitsNet.Angle

Docs.summary: Convert magnetic angle to true angle, given the variation

MemberSignature.Value: public static UnitsNet.Angle Normalize (this UnitsNet.Angle self, bool toFullCircle);
.method public static hidebysig valuetype UnitsNet.Angle Normalize(valuetype UnitsNet.Angle self, bool toFullCircle) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function Normalize (self As Angle, toFullCircle As Boolean) As Angle
static member Normalize : UnitsNet.Angle * bool -> UnitsNet.Angle

Docs.param: Set to true to normalize to 0-360°, otherwise normalizes to +/-180°
Docs.summary: Normalizes the angle so it is between 0° and 360° or between -180° and +180° respectively.

MemberSignature.Value: public static UnitsNet.Angle TrueToMagnetic (this UnitsNet.Angle angleTrue, UnitsNet.Angle variation);
.method public static hidebysig valuetype UnitsNet.Angle TrueToMagnetic(valuetype UnitsNet.Angle angleTrue, valuetype UnitsNet.Angle variation) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function TrueToMagnetic (angleTrue As Angle, variation As Angle) As Angle
static member TrueToMagnetic : UnitsNet.Angle * UnitsNet.Angle -> UnitsNet.Angle

Docs.summary: Helper method to convert a true angle to a magnetic one, given the variation.
Docs.remarks: Remember: From true to false with the wrong sign

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool TryAverageAngle (this System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<UnitsNet.Angle> inputAngles, out UnitsNet.Angle result);
.method public static hidebysig bool TryAverageAngle(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<valuetype UnitsNet.Angle> inputAngles, [out] valuetype UnitsNet.Angle& result) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function TryAverageAngle (inputAngles As IEnumerable(Of Angle), ByRef result As Angle) As Boolean
static member TryAverageAngle : seq<UnitsNet.Angle> * Angle -> bool

Docs.param: The angle that is the mean of the given angles.
Docs.summary: Calculates the average (medium) of a set of points. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mean_of_circular_quantities This method fails if an empty input set is provided or the inputs are evenly distributed over the circle.
